summary: Refined Typst styling to match AMS/journal aesthetic. Removed colored fills from theorem environments, added italic body text for theorems/lemmas (AMS plain style), preserved URLblue hyperlink colors.

artifacts.summary: Template with journal-style theorem environments (no fills, AMS typography)

completion_data.completion_summary: Refined Typst styling to match austere journal aesthetic. Removed colored backgrounds from all theorem environments while preserving hyperlink colors. Added AMS-style typography with italic theorem bodies and upright definition bodies.

next_steps: Review compiled PDF to verify austere journal aesthetic
